title: Welcome to JSON's Deli
subtitle1: Where everything is made fresh, from scratch, with a twist for your tastebuds!
subtitle2: What we don't bake, raise or grow ourselves, we source from local farms, so we know what goes into our food.

Hot Sandwiches.name: Regal Reuben
Hot Sandwiches.desc: Our spin on the classic with sustainably sourced shredded venison and smoked swiss.

Hot Sandwiches.name: First Choice Chicken Parm
ingredients: perfectly cooked chicken, choice of breaded or not
our own from Italy family recipe sauce

Cold Sandwiches.name: Verdurous Veggie
Cold Sandwiches.desc: Seasonal fresh produce, choice of cheese and bread.
ingredients: Ask about our weekly available produce

Cold Sandwiches.name: Capitol Curry Tuna
ingredients: Tuna mixed with green curry, mayo, rice vinegar, and chopped scallions

Appetizers.name: Nachos
Appetizers.desc: Tortilla chips, sliced black olives, jalapenos, scallions, shredded chedder and pepperjack, salsa fresca, homemade quacamole and sour cream.

Appetizers.name: Stuffed Mushrooms
Appetizers.desc: Button mushroom caps stuffeed with stems, green bell pepper, vialia onion, gf breadcrumbs and a blend of Parm, Romano and Asiago cheeses.

Desserts.name: Cheesecake
Desserts.desc: A slice of our version of a NY style cheesecake on a gf crust. Topped with fresh seasonal berries or our own slow cooked caramel sauce.

Desserts.name: GF Cinnamon Crumb Cake
Desserts.desc: Light, moist cake with a thick ribbon of cinnammon and topped with a crunchy cinnamon crumb topping.
